td.p: You have been invited to join Team ${(ctx.get('team_name')) or '' | safe}
Please click the button below to accept and join the team:

a.style: border-radius: 3px;display: inline-block;font-size: 14px;font-weight: 700;line-height: 24px;padding: 13px 35px 12px 35px;text-align: center;text-decoration: none !important;transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in;color: #fff;font-family: "Open Sans",sans-serif;background-color: #ff0000;

border-radius: 3px;display: inline-block;font-size: 14px;font-weight: 700;line-height: 24px;padding: 13px 35px 12px 35px;text-align: center;text-decoration: none !important;transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in;color: #fff;font-family: "Open Sans",sans-serif;background-color: #ff0000;

blockquote.p:
Or copy/paste this link in your browser
${object.user_id.signup_url}

a.style: font-family: "Open Sans",sans-serif;transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in;color: #ffffff;background-image: url(https://i3.createsend1.com/static/eb/master/03-fresh/imgf/fblike.png);background-repeat: no-repeat;background-size: 200px 56px;border-radius: 2px;display: block;font-size: 11px;font-weight: bold;line-height: 11px;padding: 8px 11px 7px 28px;text-align: left;text-decoration: none;background-color: #7b7c7d;

font-family: "Open Sans",sans-serif;transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in;color: #ffffff;background-image: url(https://i4.createsend1.com/static/eb/master/03-fresh/imgf/tweet.png);background-repeat: no-repeat;background-size: 200px 56px;border-radius: 2px;display: block;font-size: 11px;font-weight: bold;line-height: 11px;padding: 8px 11px 7px 28px;text-align: left;text-decoration: none;background-color: #7b7c7d;

font-family: "Open Sans",sans-serif;transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in;color: #ffffff;background-image: url(https://i5.createsend1.com/static/eb/master/03-fresh/imgf/lishare.png);background-repeat: no-repeat;background-size: 200px 56px;border-radius: 2px;display: block;font-size: 11px;font-weight: bold;line-height: 11px;padding: 8px 11px 7px 28px;text-align: left;text-decoration: none;background-color: #7b7c7d;

font-family: "Open Sans",sans-serif;transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in;color: #ffffff;background-image: url(https://i6.createsend1.com/static/eb/master/03-fresh/imgf/forward.png);background-repeat: no-repeat;background-size: 200px 56px;border-radius: 2px;display: block;font-size: 11px;font-weight: bold;line-height: 11px;padding: 8px 11px 7px 28px;text-align: left;text-decoration: none;background-color: #7b7c7d;

Please click the button below either to Confirm/Decline this:

ONLYteam leader are autorised to submit report on the team's behalf.

Kind Regards
The CFO Management Team
